name: E.I.
overview: This is an important game for the shooters-genre on the MSX-system, because this is the first game in which the enemy forces react to your actions, although not on the same level as in Zanac, instead of just following a simple procedure. This "intelligence" system would be worked out far better in the Zanac and Aleste games. Some Zanac and Aleste enemies can already be seen here.
